entry.title: Mixing at Supercritical Topography, review paper in Oceanography
entry.summary:
I have a proposed parameterization for turbulence caused by breaking tidal waves over sharp topography that is relatively easy to implement in numerical models.

![Turbulent breaking of internal tides near topography][Breaking]

Klymak, J.M., M. Buijsman, S.M. Legg, and R. Pinkel, 2012: The direct breaking of internal waves …
entry.content:
I have a proposed parameterization for turbulence caused by breaking tidal waves over sharp topography that is relatively easy to implement in numerical models.

![Turbulent breaking of internal tides near topography][Breaking]

Klymak, J.M., M. Buijsman, S.M. Legg, and R. Pinkel, 2012: The direct breaking of internal waves at steep topography. Oceanography, 25(2):150-159, doi:http://dx.doi.org/10.5670/oceanog.2012.50. [bib | DOI | pdf]


[Breaking]: {{ site.baseurl }}/images/PrettyHighResSm.jpg
